# Lore (Ring)
## Overview
**Aura** strong divination; **CL** 12th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 23,250 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

A creature wearing a *lore ring* can use *[[Legend Lore (Spell)|legend lore]]* and *[[Stone Tell (Spell)|stone tell]]* (v3.5 Search) check, just as a rogue does.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Find Traps (Spell)|find traps]]**,* *[[Legend Lore (Spell)|legend lore]]**,* *[[Stone Tell (Spell)|stone tell]]*

**Cost** 11,625 gp

**Source:** Complete Arcane (WotC), pg. 144
